name: Mohammed Kaif Pasha

hero.headline: Hi, I'm Mohammed Kaif Pasha — Building Intelligent Digital Futures.

bio: Computer Science Engineering student at Osmania University with a passion for building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems. I specialize in AI/ML, full-stack development, and blockchain technologies, focusing on creating impactful solutions at the intersection of emerging technologies.

education.description: Pursuing undergraduate studies in Computer Science with focus on Machine Learning, Data Science, and Full-Stack Development.

education.institution: State Board of Technical Education, Telangana
education.description: Completed diploma with strong foundation in programming, web development, and computer fundamentals.

experience.title: Industrial Training - Full Stack Development
experience.description: Hands-on training in modern web development technologies, working on real-world projects and industry-standard practices.

achievements.title: Base Blockchain Hackathon
